plant_care_guides.name: Golden Pothos
plant_care_guides.description: Golden Pothos is one of the most popular indoor plants with lush green leaves, rapid growth, and excellent air purification effects.

care_guide.light: Bright indirect light, avoid direct sunlight
care_guide.water: Water when soil surface is dry, keep slightly moist
care_guide.fertilizer: Apply liquid fertilizer every 2 weeks in spring and summer
care_guide.soil: Well-draining potting mix with good aeration

tips: Can be grown in water or soil

plant_care_guides.name: Snake Plant
plant_care_guides.description: Snake Plant has upright leaves with yellow edges, extremely drought-tolerant, ideal choice for beginners.

care_guide.light: Bright light, can tolerate partial shade
care_guide.water: Better dry than wet, reduce watering in winter
care_guide.fertilizer: Fertilize once a month during growing season

tips: Very drought-tolerant, overwatering causes root rot

plant_care_guides.name: Spider Plant
plant_care_guides.description: Spider Plant has long, narrow leaves with white stripes, produces plantlets, excellent for hanging cultivation.

care_guide.light: Bright indirect light
care_guide.water: Keep soil slightly moist
care_guide.fertilizer: Apply liquid fertilizer every 2 weeks during growing season

tips: Plantlets on runners can be used for propagation

plant_care_guides.name: Rubber Plant
plant_care_guides.description: Rubber Plant has thick, glossy leaves with upright growth habit, excellent indoor foliage plant.

care_guide.light: Bright indirect light, can tolerate partial shade
care_guide.water: Water when soil is half dry
care_guide.fertilizer: Fertilize monthly during growing season

tips: Wipe leaves regularly to maintain shine
New leaves are protected by red bracts

plant_care_guides.name: Money Tree
plant_care_guides.description: Money Tree symbolizes good fortune with palmate leaves and thick trunk, popular indoor plant.

care_guide.light: Bright indirect light
care_guide.water: Water when soil is completely dry, avoid waterlogging
care_guide.fertilizer: Fertilize monthly during growing season

tips: Sensitive to waterlogging, better dry than wet
Trunk can be braided for decoration
Yellow leaves usually indicate watering issues

plant_care_guides.name: English Ivy
plant_care_guides.description: English Ivy has beautiful leaves with strong climbing ability, suitable for hanging or climbing cultivation.

care_guide.light: Bright indirect light, can tolerate shade
care_guide.water: Keep soil moist
care_guide.fertilizer: Apply liquid fertilizer every 2 weeks during growing season

plant_care_guides.name: Monstera
plant_care_guides.description: Monstera has large leaves with unique fenestrations, representative of tropical style plants.

care_guide.light: Bright indirect light
care_guide.water: Keep soil slightly moist
care_guide.fertilizer: Fertilize every 2 weeks during growing season

plant_care_guides.name: ZZ Plant
plant_care_guides.description: ZZ Plant has thick, orderly arranged leaves, symbolizes wealth and prosperity, extremely drought-tolerant.

care_guide.light: Bright indirect light, can tolerate low light
care_guide.water: Water only when soil is completely dry
care_guide.fertilizer: Fertilize monthly during growing season

tips: Extremely drought-tolerant, overwatering causes root rot

plant_care_guides.name: Peace Lily
plant_care_guides.description: Peace Lily has green leaves and elegant white flowers, excellent indoor flowering plant.

care_guide.light: Bright indirect light, avoid direct sun
care_guide.water: Keep soil moist
care_guide.fertilizer: Apply liquid fertilizer every 2 weeks during growing season

tips: Brown leaf tips may indicate low humidity

plant_care_guides.name: Asparagus Fern
plant_care_guides.description: Asparagus Fern has delicate feathery foliage with elegant form and scholarly appearance, but requires careful care.

care_guide.light: Bright indirect light, avoid direct sun
care_guide.water: Keep soil slightly moist
care_guide.fertilizer: Apply diluted liquid fertilizer every 2 weeks during growing season

plant_care_guides.name: Aloe Vera
plant_care_guides.description: Aloe Vera has thick, succulent leaves with medicinal properties, very practical plant.

care_guide.light: Full sun, can tolerate partial shade
care_guide.water: Water when soil is completely dry
care_guide.fertilizer: Fertilize monthly during growing season

tips: Extremely drought-tolerant, barely needs water in winter
Can be used to treat minor burns

plant_care_guides.name: Cactus
plant_care_guides.description: Cactus comes in various forms, extremely drought-tolerant, representative of low-maintenance plants.

care_guide.light: Full sun
care_guide.water: Water sparingly in spring/summer, stop watering in winter
care_guide.fertilizer: Use cactus-specific fertilizer monthly during growing season

tips: Better dry than wet, overwatering is fatal

plant_care_guides.name: Clivia
plant_care_guides.description: Clivia has thick, symmetrical leaves and vibrant flowers, high-end indoor flowering plant.

care_guide.light: Bright indirect light
care_guide.water: Water when soil is half dry
care_guide.fertilizer: Apply liquid fertilizer every 2 weeks during growing season

tips: Needs winter cold treatment to bloom

plant_care_guides.name: Sago Palm
plant_care_guides.description: Sago Palm has hard, iron-like leaves with slow growth, symbolizes resilience and perseverance.

care_guide.light: Full sun, can tolerate partial shade
care_guide.water: Water when soil is completely dry
care_guide.fertilizer: Fertilize monthly during growing season

tips: New leaves take a long time to unfurl

plant_care_guides.name: Elephant Ear
plant_care_guides.description: Elephant Ear has huge leaves that drip water from tips in high humidity, high ornamental value.

care_guide.light: Bright indirect light
care_guide.water: Keep soil moist
care_guide.fertilizer: Apply liquid fertilizer every 2 weeks during growing season

plant_care_guides.name: Lucky Bamboo
plant_care_guides.description: Lucky Bamboo symbolizes good fortune, can grow in water or soil, one of the most popular indoor plants.

care_guide.light: Bright indirect light, can tolerate low light
care_guide.water: Change water regularly for hydroponic, keep soil moist for soil cultivation
care_guide.fertilizer: Add nutrients for hydroponic, fertilize monthly for soil cultivation

tips: Hydroponic cultivation is easier to manage

plant_care_guides.name: Phalaenopsis Orchid
plant_care_guides.description: Phalaenopsis Orchid has butterfly-like beautiful flowers, high-end flowering plant with demanding care requirements.

care_guide.light: Bright indirect light, avoid direct sun
care_guide.water: Use moss for moisture, avoid waterlogging
care_guide.fertilizer: Apply orchid-specific fertilizer weekly during growing season

plant_care_guides.name: Anthurium
plant_care_guides.description: Anthurium has bright red flowers with long blooming period, excellent indoor flowering plant.

care_guide.light: Bright indirect light
care_guide.water: Keep soil slightly moist
care_guide.fertilizer: Apply liquid fertilizer every 2 weeks during growing season

plant_care_guides.name: Jasmine
plant_care_guides.description: Jasmine has intense fragrance and white flowers, famous fragrant flowering plant.

care_guide.light: Full sun
care_guide.water: Keep soil moist
care_guide.fertilizer: Apply liquid fertilizer every 2 weeks during growing season

plant_care_guides.name: Mint
plant_care_guides.description: Mint has fresh fragrance and rapid growth, both ornamental and edible.

care_guide.light: Full sun or partial shade
care_guide.water: Keep soil moist
care_guide.fertilizer: Apply liquid fertilizer every 2 weeks during growing season

tips: Can be used for tea or seasoning

spring.description: Spring is the peak growing season for plants

summer.description: Summer's high temperature and humidity require special attention

autumn.description: Autumn is when plants prepare for dormancy

winter.description: Winter is when most plants enter dormancy
